mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INQUIRY( INQUIRY_NO, MEMBER_NO, PRODUCT_NO, INQUIRY_TITLE, INQUIRY_CONTENT, INQUIRY_WRT_DATE, INQUIRY_MOD_DATE )VALUES( INQUIRY_SEQ.nextval, #{memberNo}, #{productNo}, #{inquiryTitle}, #{inquiryContent}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE INQUIRY SET INQUIRY_CONTENT = #{inquiryContent}, INQUIRY_MOD_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE INQUIRY_NO = #{inquiryNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INQUIRY_REPLY( INQUIRY_REPLY_NO, SELLER_NO, INQUIRY_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, REPLY_WRT_DATE, REPLY_MOD_DATE )VALUES( INQUIRY_REPLY_SEQ.nextval, #{sellerNo}, #{inquiryNo}, #{replyContent}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM INQUIRY WHERE PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo}
